author: cnbc.com
title: OUTFRONT Media Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
NEW YORK, OUTFRONT Media Inc. (NYSE: OUT) announced today that its board of directors has approved a quarterly cash dividend on the Company's stock of $0.36 per share payable on March 30, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 9, 2018.
About OUTFRONT Media Inc.
OUTFRONT Media connects brands with consumers outside of their homes through one of the largest and most diverse sets of billboard, transit, and mobile assets in North America. Through its ON Smart Media platform, OUTFRONT Media is implementing digital technology that will fundamentally change the ways advertisers engage people on-the-go.
